title: 'Vaccine passports make me even more reluctant to get a Covid jab'
content:
1. 'Vaccine passports make me even more reluctant to get a Covid jab'  BBC News
  2. Plans for vaccine passports in England scrapped, says Sajid Javid  Guardian News
  3. Merkel Urges Vaccinations; U.K. Passport Decision: Virus Update  Yahoo News Canada
  4. In trying to get out of a Covid-19 emergency, are we now triggering a privacy crisis?  Stuff.co.nz
  5. Sajid Javid says plans to introduce Covid-19 passports for crowded events have been scrapped  The Telegraph
